reducers.name: takeLast
description: Consider that **trigger.takeLast()** is the same as **pipe.takeLast(-)**

reducers.name: take
description: Consider that **trigger.take()** is the same as **pipe.take(-)**

reducers.name: drop
description: Consider that **trigger.drop()** is the same as **pipe.drop(-)**

reducers.name: dropLast
description: Consider that **trigger.dropLast()** is the same as **pipe.dropLast(-)**

reducers.name: append
description: Consider that **trigger.append()** is the same as **pipe.append(-)**

reducers.name: prepend
description: Consider that **trigger.prepend()** is the same as **pipe.prepend(-)**

reducers.name: flatten
description: Consider that **trigger.flatten()** is the same as **pipe.flatten(-)**

reducers.name: reverse
description: Consider that **trigger.reverse()** is the same as **pipe.reverse(-)**

reducers.name: concat
description: Consider that **trigger.concat()** is the same as **pipe.concat(-)**

reducers.name: filter
description: Consider that **trigger.filter()** is the same as **pipe.filter(-)**

reducers.name: filterNot
description: Consider that **trigger.filterNot()** is the same as **pipe.filterNot(-)**

reducers.name: sort
description: Consider that **trigger.sort()** is the same as **pipe.sort(-)**
